summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein and several individuals discussing financial matters related to Bear Stearns and other issues. Epstein expresses concerns about a meeting and the handling of funds, indicating a dispute with JPMorgan. The email highlights the confidential nature of the communication and includes legal disclaimers.

keyFacts: The email discusses a financial dispute involving Jeffrey Epstein and JPMorgan related to Bear Stearns.
Glenn expressed that he would have advised Epstein to withdraw his funds had he known about certain financial dealings.
The communication is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
There are references to meetings that occurred in 2004 and 2011 regarding financial issues.
Several individuals are mentioned in relation to the financial discussions, indicating a network of connections.
